Articles.Content:
So I got Andorf face-sliding and breakdancing, I want to see what you can do! It\'d be awesome if we could gather a ton of clips of Kerbals doing really stupid stuff and then make an epic montage out of it. Whadda-ya-say!?

No rules, your prize is being included in a montage of stupid stuff. xD

I\'d like to present an entry I used for my own challenge, because it seemed hilariously fitting.

15:10 and 18:40 are the highlights, but there is plenty of stuff throughout.

I\'d like to present an entry I used for my own challenge, because it seemed hilariously fitting.

15:10 and 18:40 are the highlights, but there is plenty of stuff throughout.

Awesome! xD I\'m watching it now, the stairs idea seems good, and I love the climb a ladder and fall off bit.
my entry here\'s the video http://youtu.be/dVpBMz32ML4 its me catapulting kerbals with my patent pending Kerbal Rocketpult
Mine was to fly a scaled down model of a Halo ring into orbit, still haven\'t gotten there yet... But close!

Mine was to fly a scaled down model of a Halo ring into orbit, still haven\'t gotten there yet... But close!

I sont understand what you this has to do with the challange? did you mean to post this some where else?

Mine was to fly a scaled down model of a Halo ring into orbit, still haven\'t gotten there yet... But close!

Yeah, it\'s cool but...

I sont understand what you this has to do with the challange? did you mean to post this some where else?

After a moment of going 'Oh that\'s cool, reminds me of the giant station I got into orbit back in 0.14.4...' I realized, this just isn\'t the right kind of entry for this challenge. It\'s mostly supposed to be about doing stupid things with EVAs, although rocket stuff would be cool too, just if it was stupid.

If you make a video of that thing blowing up on take-off.

my entry here\'s the video http://youtu.be/dVpBMz32ML4 its me catapulting kerbals with my patent pending Kerbal Rocketpult

I love it. xD

my entry here\'s the video http://youtu.be/dVpBMz32ML4 its me catapulting kerbals with my patent pending Kerbal Rocketpult

Is it bad that seeing the kerbals hit the ground and go 'puff' made me chuckle?

Is it bad that seeing the kerbals hit the ground and go 'puff' made me chuckle?

Nah, but it is a little strange that Kerbals are made of Mun dust.

Speaking of...arches built on the Mun...Kerbals are made of Mun dust...are Kerbals originally from the Mun!? O.o CONSPIRACY!

Nah, but it is a little strange that Kerbals are made of Mun dust.

Speaking of...arches built on the Mun...Kerbals are made of Mun dust...are Kerbals originally from the Mun!? O.o CONSPIRACY!

do not be ashamed i loled the first time i did this to

my entry here\'s the video -snip- its me catapulting kerbals with my patent pending Kerbal Rocketpult

Lol, the ladder curving \'round the capsule is awesome! I quote ImaginaryJeb:

Wheeeeeeee 8)

So, I just found this and almost died laughing, I feel this is totally the appropriate place to put it.

EDIT: This guy on YouTube, he just wins this challenge without even entering it...
